https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLuXY3ddo_8nzrO74UeZQVZOb5-wIS6krJ

00:00 introduction to windows keyboard shortcuts
00:27 functional keys windows keyboard shortcuts
03:05 ALT key windows keyboard shortcuts
04:04 CTRL key windows keyboard shortcuts
08:22 SHIFT key windows keyboard shortcuts
10:20 windows key windows keyboard shortcuts
12:18 outro

41 windows keyboard shortcuts to make you a professional in using the Windows keyboard.

 .اختصارات الكمبيوتر لاحتراف استخدام لوحة المفاتيح

Functional Keys Shortcuts:
F1 - display help
F2 - Rename item
F3 - Search
F4 - Display Address Bar
F5 - Refresh/Reload
F6 - Cycle through screen elements
F10 - Activate Menu Bar

ALT key shortcuts:
ALT + TAB - Switch Forward
ALT + TAB + Shift - Switch Backward
ALT + F4 - Close Program
ALT + F - FIle menu options
ALT +. E - Edit menu options

CTRL key shortucts:
CTRL + F4 - Close Window
CTRL + ESC -  Open Start Menu
CTRL + ALT + DEL - Reboot/Switch User/ Open Task Manager
CTRL + Plus - Zoom in
CTRL + Minus - Zoom out
CTRL + C - Copy
CTRL + V - Paste
CTRL + X - Cut
CTRL + A - Select All
CTRL + Home - Go to the beginning of the content
CTRL + END - Go to the end of the document
CTRL + Left Arrow - Move one word to the left at a time
CTRL + Right Arrow - Move one word to the right
CTRL + F - Search for a file in desktop, my computer, or explorer
CTRL + Z - Undo the last action
CTRL + Y - Redo an action
CTRL + Shift + Esc - Open task manager
CTRL + R -  Refresh active window

SHIFT key shortcuts:
SHIFT + Del - Delete selected item without moving it to Recycle Bin
SHIFT + Arrow - Select items
SHIFT + F10 - Display shortcut menu
SHIFT + Home - Highlight from the current position to the beginning of the line
SHIFT + End  - Highlight from the current position to the end of line

WINDOWS key shortcuts:
WIN + Spacebar - Change input language and keyboard layout
WIN + V - Open the clipboard history
WIN + E - Launch file explorer
WIN + plus - Open the magnifier tool
WIN + I - Open the settings in Windows
WIN + D - Minimize all open windows
WIN + Tab - Switch between open programs in the taskbar
WIN + R - Open the run window

#windows #shortcuts #keyboard #codezilla
